title: Submissive Fairy Tales
description: Enter a world of mythological places, mermaids, king's harems, dragon-like beings, and gypsies-a world of erotic domination and submission in times and places far different from our own. Submissive Fairy Tales is a collection of previously published novellas by Kitty Thomas: The Auction, Awakening, and The King's Pleasure.
author: Kitty Thomas
